name: KTD Creative
description:
KTD Creative (KTD), formerly Kate Tallent Design, is a full-service digital and print creative agency located in Washington DC.
We deliver big agency solutions at a more affordable price. We offer responsive web design, web development, content creation, search engine marketing, social media marketing, print design and more. We provide Drupal and WordPress content management systems amongst others. Through inspired branding, strategy and graphic design, we garner results.
